description.full: Scene It?® Bright Lights! Big Screen! offers a wide variety of media-rich trivia that provides movie fans and social gamers with a lively, competitive group gaming experience. Trivia content in the game includes recently released 2009 movies as well as fan favorite Hollywood hits from the last four decades.
